thread.title: Burkina Faso military junta reopens country's borders
thread.title_full: Burkina Faso military junta reopens country's borders | News24

author: news24.com
title: Burkina Faso military junta reopens country's borders
text:
Ouagadougou - A military junta in Burkina Faso reopened the country's borders on Friday and said it would not stay long in power, one day after seizing power in a coup that overthrew a democratic transition.
"The National Democratic Council [junta] accepts the principle of mediation and reaffirms its intention not to stay in power for a long time," said a statement on state television before talks on Friday with the Economic Community of West African States.
